title: Women referred by physicians for eating disorders

content.prompt: Research shows that women who are referred by a physician to participate in a study of eating disorders have more severe problems than women who volunteer on their own to participate in the study. If research on eating disorders regularly involves only women referred by physicians, the results of the studies might be limited because of the presence of

topic.text: 5.4: Selection of Categories of Psychological Disorders

skill.text: 2.B: Evaluate the appropriate use of research design elements in experimental methodology.
